item.title: PINS
item.description: score:-103 Chances: Pinterest (PINS) closed at $38.04 in the latest trading session, marking a +0.9% move from the prior day. Pinterest, Inc. (NYSE:PINS) saw a significant share price rise of over 20% in the past couple of months on the NYSE. Risks: A closer look suggests a bearish view for Snap and a neutral view for Pinterest.
